channel.title: NMS:CG on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in NMS:CG on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Carlyle Revved Up Buyout Exits Last Quarter, Boosting Profits
item.description: Carlyle Group Inc. pulled off a string of private equity exits in the second quarter, lifting earnings during a stretch when some of its buyout rivals struggled to sell out of bets profitably.

item.title: Carlyle Hires Goldman Executive for Credit Business
item.description: Carlyle Group Inc. hired a Goldman Sachs Group Inc. executive to lead its direct lending arm as the money manager works to grow its private credit business.
